CustomField.description: VPS G4™ Device: •Intravascular Doppler – directional blood flow for guidance & Blue Bullseye •Open platform/pre-loaded PICCs available with Arrowg+ard Blue Advance™ Protection & A5 •Most precise tip confirmation system •No subjective interpretation of P-wave required
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Intravascular Doppler – directional blood flow for guidance & Blue Bullseye Open platform/preloaded PICCs available with Arrowg+ard Blue Advance® Protection & A5 Precise tip confirmation system No subjective interpretation of P-wave required Confirm if goals of Eval are met, commitment to purchase outright or loaner agreement based on usage Confirm “quiet period” for the incumbent competitive vendor Discuss setup of the system, ensure Biomed is informed
